name: Alpha AstroTaverna
body:
### AstroTaverna


To install the Alpha AstroTaverna plugin to Taverna, download and install [Taverna 2.3](http://www.taverna.org.uk/download/workbench/2-3/) and [add a plugin site](http://www.mygrid.org.uk/dev/wiki/display/taverna/Installing+plugins):

`http://wf4ever.github.com/astrotaverna/repository/`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
